ValidationRule.description: Energy and Atmosphere - Optimize Energy Performance - Point Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 0 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 1 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 2 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 3 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 4 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 5 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 6 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 7 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 8 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 9 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 10 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 11 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 12 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 13 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 14 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 15 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 16 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 17 || LEED_USR_Mod_EA_2__c = 18 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field's value is outside of the acceptable range. Please adjust to a value of 0 through 18.
